channel.title: CVE Feed for PickPlugins -- ComboBlocks
channel.description: The latest CVEs for PickPlugins -- ComboBlocks

item.title: CVE-2024-43155|2024-08-14T14:14:18.172Z -- pickplugins -- comboblocks
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in PickPlugins ComboBlocks allows Stored XSS.This issue affects ComboBlocks: from n/a through 2.2.86.
